none: No recommendations could be found for the selected branch(es).

remove-unused-branch.title: Remove unused branch
remove-unused-branch.description: The branch '{{branch}}' has no commits ahead of upstreams, and has a single parent; if it is unused, it may be removed.

remove-invalid-integration.title: Remove invalid integration branch
remove-invalid-integration.description: The integration branch only has one upstream (or all other upstreams are upstream of that one). It should be removed.
